{% raw %}

class CfgNode[source]

CfgNode(init_dict=None) :: dict

CfgNode represents an internal node in the configuration tree. It's a simple dict-like container that allows for attribute-based access to keys.

A simple configuration tree, copy and simplify from yacs. Example:

cfg1 = CfgNode()

cfg1.DATASET = CfgNode()
cfg1.DATASET.NAME = 'FashionMNIST'
cfg1.DATASET.STATS = ((0.1307,), (0.3081,))

cfg1

CfgNode({'DATASET': CfgNode({'NAME': 'FashionMNIST', 'STATS': ((0.1307,), (0.3081,))})})
{% endraw %}
